task.title: Creating a meeting list
task.shortdesc: You can create a list of meetings for easier access when sending a meeting request to a chat partner.

taskbody.context: The meeting list is referenced when you start a meeting from a the chat conversation area. See for more information.

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) next to your name and select Meetings.
Type the URL for the meeting in the Enter a URL field.
Type a name for the meeting in the Add a name field.
